title: New Skins
body:
Personally I would like to see some new skins come through Riot for example Debonair Zed or Masquerade Zed
I think these would be some good skin ideas any other thought just post below
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}  No skins for me ATM :(

replies.body: lol deb zed in love with akali wtf that is the worst idea ive thought of (suicide) also {{champion:432}} is fat
My friend had a different idea for battlecast Zed as well that could possibly be quite a good skin with the right animations
omfg debonair zed is a 10/10 idea
